  • View page source

cosmos.cosmos_hurrywave.CoSMoS_HurryWave.pre_process¶

CoSMoS_HurryWave.pre_process()[source]¶

Preprocess HurryWave model.

  • Extract and write wave conditions.

  • Write input file.

  • Write meteo forcing.

  • Add observation points for nested models and observation stations.

  • Optional: make ensemble of models.

See also

cht.nesting.nest2()
